house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1985 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Microwave,Spanish Style, Storage Space
